definition: to consider as/to take to be
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Does Bruce see him as a left-winger or a central midfielder?
sentences.chinese: 布魯斯會把他當成一個左邊鋒還是中場球員？

sentences.english: Today's companies should think of high-earning singles as a key market.
sentences.chinese: 當今的企業應該把高收入的單身族當成重要的市場。

sentences.english: In primitive tribes, dreams were thought to be the indication of God or the haunting of the devil.
sentences.chinese: 在原始部落中，夢被當成天神降臨或是妖魔附體。

sentences.english: I entertained myself flicking wheat-based projectiles at the cat.
sentences.chinese: 我把小麪糰當成子彈彈向那隻貓，以此來打發時間。

sentences.english: Break the task down into little bits of time. Make it a game.
sentences.chinese: 把任務分解成小段的時間，把它當成遊戲。

sentences.english: Don't consider me as CEO. Consider me as your project manager.
sentences.chinese: 不要把我當成CEO，就當做是一個項目經理。

sentences.english: Hope everybody to chongqing food web forums for his own family, often at home.
sentences.chinese: 希望大家把渝菜網論壇當成自己的家，常回家看看。

sentences.english: Gradually, Li felt at home with the factory and the life.
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地，李萬勝把東方汽輪機廠當成了自己的家。

sentences.english: Today, my grandpa who is staying with us mistook me for a Japanese soldier and started to hit me with a bat.
sentences.chinese: 今天來家裏住的爺爺把我當成了日本鬼子用球棒打我。

sentences.english: A lot of people here think of Lebanon as the Middle East, as like a war zone.
sentences.chinese: 許多人把黎巴嫩當成中東，就好像一個戰區一樣。

sentences.english: Everything I told him seemed to go in one ear and out the other.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴他的每件事他好像都當成耳邊風一樣。

sentences.english: Unlabelled terminals must not be used as "tie points" for other wires.
sentences.chinese: 不可將無標號的接線端當成其它導線的“結點”。

sentences.english: Investing your emotions in someone. That's scary.
sentences.chinese: 把對某人的感情當成是投資，是可怕的。

sentences.english: When out of work, treat the job hunt as a full-time job.
sentences.chinese: 失業時，要把找工作當成一份全職工作來做。

sentences.english: I was made to look ridiculous because of Fowler, and I defended him.
sentences.chinese: 我被當成很好可笑，就因爲科拿，而我是保護他。

sentences.english: I hadn’t expected this. I had been outed as an eco-murderer.
sentences.chinese: 我沒想到他會這麼說，我被當成了一個“生態殺手”。
